purpose: Facilitates deep research by integrating language models with various tools to automate information gathering and analysis.
principle: Utilizes a combination of language models and external tools such as web crawling and Python execution to perform comprehensive research tasks.
reusability: Modular design allows for integration with different tools and APIs, enabling customization for specific research needs.
limitations: Being in alpha stage, it may have stability issues and limited documentation; primarily focused on research tasks.
name: deer-flow
description: DeerFlow is a community-driven Deep Research framework, combining language models with tools like web search, crawling, and Python execution, while contributing back to the open-source community.
highlight: Combines language models with tools like web search, crawling, and Python execution for deep research tasks.
